channel.title: Need Help Adding A Weapon!

item.title: Need Help Adding A Weapon!
item.dc:creator: @iz3_legend iz3 legend
item.description:
@iz3_legend wrote:

its client sided, and those are only for pi servers. If you have a delta you would add it into class8.java. Also you would need to either convert the ints or grab new ones to fit delta.

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help Adding A Weapon!
item.dc:creator: @siege123 siege123
item.description:
@siege123 wrote:

OK im trying to add a Chaotic rapier to my 317 server and every one tells me to add it in Itemdef.java or equipment.java but i dont see any of those in the files ? Can some help me.
Heres the code i have for it.

[code]if(i == ****)
{
itemDef.actions = new String[5];
itemDef.actions[1] = “Wield”;
itemDef.modelID = 35084;
itemDef.maleEquip1 = 35085;
itemDef.femaleEquip1 = 35085;
itemDef.anInt188 = -1;
itemDef.anInt164 = -1;
itemDef.modelZoom = 1400;
itemDef.modelRotation1 = 498;
itemDef.modelRotation2 = 1300;
itemDef.modelOffset1 = -1;
itemDef.modelOffset2 = -1;
itemDef.name = “Chaotic rapier”;
itemDef.description = “A weapon of amazing speed.”.getBytes();
itemDef.aByte205 = -11;
itemDef.aByte154 = -11;
break;

if(i == ****)
{
itemDef.actions = new String[5];
itemDef.actions[1] = “Wield”;
itemDef.modelID = 35086;
itemDef.maleEquip1 = 35087;
itemDef.femaleEquip1 = 35087;
itemDef.anInt188 = -1;
itemDef.anInt164 = -1;
itemDef.modelZoom = 1300;
itemDef.modelRotation1 = 498;
itemDef.modelRotation2 = 1300;
itemDef.modelOffset1 = -1;
itemDef.modelOffset2 = -1;
itemDef.name = “Chaotic longsword”;
itemDef.description = “A weapon of incredible accuracy.”.getBytes();
itemDef.aByte205 = -11;
itemDef.aByte154 = -11;
break;[/code]
And i also dont know where to add it?

Read full topic
